title: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon R: The Movie
title_en: Sailor Moon R: The Movie - The Promise of the Rose
title_jp: 美少女戦士セーラームーンＲ THE MOVIE
synopsis: When Mamoru was little he gave a rose to a little boy named Fiore. Fiore promised that one day he would bring Mamoru lots of flowers. Now Fiore has come back to earth but his intentions are not merely to fulfil a promise...
